result.title: IDEXX Laboratories Announces Third Quarter Results
result.text: WESTBROOK, Maine--(BUSINESS WIRE)--IDEXX Laboratories, Inc. (NASDAQ: IDXX), a global leader in pet healthcare innovation, today announced third quarter results. Third Quarter Results The Company reports revenues of $1,105 million for the third quarter of 2025, an increase of 13% as reported and 12% organic, driven by Companion Animal Group ("CAG") growth of 14% as reported and 12% organic, and Livestock, Poultry and Dairy ("LPD") revenue growth of 17% as reported and 14% organic.
